means: 秘密交谈的；私下会谈的

sentence.Network_en: Charles and I were closeted in his study for the briefing session.
sentence.Network_cn: 我和查尔斯在他的书房里闭门开简介会。

sentence.Network_en: The prime minister has been closeted with his finance ministers for the past 12 hours.
sentence.Network_cn: 过去的12个小时首相一直在和财政部长们密谈。

sentence.Network_en: A week later he was closeted with her father.
sentence.Network_cn: 一个星期后,他与她父亲进行了一次密谈.

entry.tran: 秘密交谈的;私下会谈的
entry.def: If you are closeted with someone, you are talking privately to them.

example.ex: The prime minister has been closeted with his finance ministers for the past 12 hours...
example.tran: 过去的12个小时首相一直在和财政部长们密谈。

example.ex: Charles and I were closeted in his study for the briefing session.
example.tran: 我和查尔斯在他的书房里闭门开简介会。

auth_sentence.content: He was closeted alone with Hudson for a long time.

auth_sentence.content: It was a very closeted and controlled existence.

auth_sentence.content: Some of the Churchmen whom he had closeted had offered to make large concessions.
